adjectives.description: windburned (comparative more windburned, superlative most windburned)

entries.meaning: Of people or body parts: suffering from windburn.
examples: Vaseline is a good gift. It can be used for may purposes. It serves as a lubricant. It eases feet that have marched far. It is good for burns. It relieves the pain of sunburnt or windburnt skin.

entries.meaning: Of plants: dried or damaged by the wind.
examples: The morning air blew down a fragrant whiff,
Combing the wind-burnt grasses on the cliff.
